I have just finished reading all about the great Oda Nobunaga of the 
Tosho=
gowa Clan (hope I spelt that correctly) and then I was watching 
Samurai De=
eper Kyo the other evening and wowie- The noble Nobunaga has 
been cast as =
the main villain of the piece (Spoilers)

He is supposedly a demon king who=
 came to earth four years ago at the 
Battle of Sekigahara (which I now kno=
w was in 1600) and is seeking his 
body as is Kyo or Demon Eyes Kyo as they=
 call him. Why? So he can be 
resurrected as a terrible monster and take ov=
er Earth. 

I was saddened to see such a noble hero thus portrayed. More la=
ter 
perhaps. Have a glorious day. Toodles-K&K
